title: DIY Nut Milks, Nut Butters and More - From Almonds to Walnuts
description:
Publisher: The Experiment (January 13, 2015)
Publication Date: January 13, 2015
Language: English
ASIN: B00KLNAIIU

Your all-in-one guide to making creamy milks, velvety butters, and satisfying treats from almonds, cashews, hazelnuts, and more!

DIY Nut Milks, Nut Butters & More brings nut power to the people with more than 50 recipes for homemade nut milks and buttersÃ¢â‚¬â€along with delicious, whole-food snacks and desserts that put them to use. Inside youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll even find tasty ideas for using the leftover nut pulp! YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll discover all sorts of goodies inside, including:
Strawberry Brazil Nut Milk

These decadent yet straightforward recipes use simple ingredients that are most likely already in your pantry. Even betterÃ¢â‚¬â€every dish is gluten-free and vegan, and most are grain-free, too. Filled with smart advice, helpful tips, and fabulous recipes, this is your ultimate guide to homemade nut milks, nut butters, and beyond
